name: EitherOr
0:
”Alexa, open Either Or”
”Either is Chinese Food”
”Or is Italian Food”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: either or
des: Let's face it, you have enough on your plate. Why waste energy debating over trivial things? Either Or does this work for you. Tell us the two things you are choosing between and we will make the decision on your behalf. Simple and effective.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
